update.description:
5/12/2016 Update: 1. NEW: Different cover image for English books 2. NEW: Cover page title in Table of Contents automatically adapts to the language of the book (Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese and English) 3. NEW: Add chapter title for contents before the first existing chapter title 4. NEW: Support keyboard shortcut Ctrl+A in textboxes 5. NEW: Better regex for chapter extraction 6. FIXED: Logic when the text file's name is ill-formatted 7. FIXED: Bug when the text file's name is ill-formatted 8. FIXED: Bug when HTML special characters are not properly escaped 9. NEW: UI Font depend on UI language
5/12/2016 更新： 1. 新增：英文书封面 2. 新增：封面在目录中与书的语言一致（简体中文，繁体中文，英文） 3. 新增：为第一个章节标题之前的内容自动添加标题 4. 新增：在Textbox里支持Ctrl+A快捷键 5. 新增：完善章节提取正则 6. 修复：TXT文件名不规范处理逻辑 7. 修复：当TXT文件名不规范时，生成EPUB失败的问题 8. 修复：文本中的特殊字符没有替换成HTML格式 9. 新增：界面字体根据界面语言而定
